summary: LEFT REAR SEAT ANCHOR WAS LOOSE, SO WE LOOKED.  A LARGE HOLE HAD RUSTED OUT OF THE INNER FENDER CAUSING THE ANCHOR TO COMPLETELY DETACH FROM THE BODY.  WE TOOK IT IN TO GET CHECKED OUT AND THEY AGREED IT HAD COMPLETELY RUSTED THROUGH AND THE RIGHT SIDE IS ALSO RUSTING OUT, ALTHOUGH NOT THE  POINT OF COMPLETELY RUSTING THROUGH, YET.  WE ARE JUST THANKFUL THIS WAS NOTICED WHEN WE WERE PARKED AND NOT DRIVING 65 MPH CAUSING AN ACCIDENT.  *TR
